title: Hour 2: Lamarvelous
description:
Harry Douglas, Chris Canty and Sam Acho join the show to debate if Lamar Jackson is the toughest QB to game-plan for. The crew also discuss if there is a problem with Deshaun Watson being at Browns camp and if there's an issue with Tyreek Hill's comments about Tua. Later Angela Rye joins the show to discuss the recent updates regarding the release of Brittney Griner. The crew also debates if the Cowboys can still count on Ezekiel Elliot to be an impact player.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Hour 2: Is Lamar Jackson the toughest quarterback to game-plan for
